mapper.select: SELECT p_seq, m_id, p_subject, p_service, p_location, p_time, p_year, (select m_name from tblmember m where pf.m_id = m.m_id) as m_name, (select pg_name from tblPGallery g where pf.p_seq = g.p_seq and rownum = 1) as pg_name FROM ( select p_seq, m_id, p_subject, p_service, p_location, p_time, p_year, row_number() over(order by p_seq desc) as rNum from tblportfolio ) pf where rNum between #{param1} and #{param2} order by p_seq desc

SELECT p_seq, m_id, p_subject, p_service, p_location, p_time, p_year, (select m_name from tblmember m where pf.m_id = m.m_id) as m_name, (select pg_name from tblPGallery g where pf.p_seq = g.p_seq and rownum = 1) as pg_name FROM ( select p_seq, m_id, p_subject, p_service, p_location, p_time, p_year, row_number() over(order by p_seq desc) as rNum from tblportfolio where p_service = #{param3} ) pf where rNum between #{param1} and #{param2} order by p_seq desc
select p.*, (select m_name from tblmember m where p.m_id = m.m_id) as m_name from tblportfolio p where p.p_seq = #{p_seq}
select count(*) from tblportfolio where p_service = #{p_service}
select pg_name from tblPGallery where p_seq = #{p_seq} and rownum = 1
